text: Hai loko! Asim tuhanu ika adami' ate ika aurata tom paida kita ate tuhanu jati'am ate parivaram vica vada dita tam ki tusim ika dusare nu pachano. Besaka alaha de nere tuhade vico' zi'ada izata vala uha hai jihara sabha tom zi'ada (jivana vica) sajama rakhada hai. Besaka alaha janana vala ate khabara rakhana vala hai
